title: Littlearth NFL Womens Retro Hoodie Purse
features: Made in the USA and Imported
Officially licensed NFL, NHL, NCAA purse features full-color embroidered team logo
This unique purse looks like a miniature hoodie sweatshirt turned into a bag
This cotton poly blend bag measures 9.5” tall x 15.5” wide x 4” deep
Features fully lined interior with patch pocket and magnetic closure
Kangaroo style pocket and laces complete the hoodie look
description: Wish you could have your favorite sweatshirt with you all day, every day? You can with Little Earth's Hoodie Purse. A beautiful and unique handbag designed to look and feel like your favorite hoodie sweatshirt so you can support your team and be comfortable at the same time. Each purse is detailed with zig zag stitching and features magnetic closure.
